title: Bonus Preview: Sex and Body Image
itunes:title: Bonus Preview: Sex and Body Image
description:
Hey Whorehive, enjoy a preview of one of the bonus episodes that is featured on Patreon! If you are all caught up Whoreible Decisions and looking for more, there is currently 18 bonus episodes on Patreon. This specific episode, Mandii is joined by Nieema Simone of the Sophisticated Ignorance podcast and the two discuss their weight-loss journeys via the gastric sleeve weight-loss procedure, being fetishized as bigger women, how weight can effect your sex life and more. To become a patron, go to Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions and subscribe! Receive episodes early, bonus episodes, meet the duo and essentially become producers of one of the fastest growing black, sex positive podcasts out! Help us pick guests, topics, and more! Guest: IG @nieema_simone Follow Mandii on all social media platforms @Fullcourtpumps Don't forget to use the hashtag #whoreibledecisions on Twitter and follow the page @whoreible_decisions on IG and @whoreiblepod on Twitter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
